alert.note: Alert for Barton; Ellsworth; Lincoln; McPherson; Rice; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 3:28AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern McPherson, southeastern Lincoln, Rice, Ellsworth, southeastern Barton and Saline Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 327 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Kanopolis to 7 miles north of Hudson. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salina, Great Bend, Lyons, Ellsworth, Ellinwood, Kanopolis, Marquette, Chase, Holyrood, Bushton, Geneseo, Brookville, Smolan, Alden, Lorraine, New Cambria, Raymond, Falun, Glendale and Frederick. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 85 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 227 and 266. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Barton; Ellsworth; Lincoln; McPherson; Rice; Saline
